section.title: Launch instances
section.para: Instances are virtual machines that run inside the cloud. You can launch an instance directly from one of the available OpenStack images or from an image that you have copied to a persistent volume. The OpenStack Image Service provides a pool of images that are accessible to members of different projects.

section.title: SSH in to your instance
section.para: To SSH into your instance, you use the downloaded keypair file.

note.para: The username is ubuntu for the Ubuntu cloud images on TryStack.
